title: 3ds max 8 service pack 3
description:
AutodeskÃ‚Â® 3ds MaxÃ‚Â® 8 Service Pack 3 includes a number of critical fixes for 3ds Max 8 across several functional areas, including edit poly, Biped, Cloth & Load/Save animation.

This service pack also includes all bug fixes provided in Service Pack 1 and 2 in the following functional areas: Biped, Cloth, Batch Render, Hair, Material Editor, Maxscript, Script Controller, SDK, Snaps, trackview, particle flow, rendering, DX, display, UV Unwrap and mental ray.
